item.title: Can't logout if in Combat
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

[quote=“Musicmad, post:4, topic:182940”][quote author=DuhPk link=topic=244625.msg2064992#msg2064992 date=1203452761]
Nope no errors…but

What are those coords for…what areas? Incase my server is part of it.
[/quote]

Oh, you can edit those to what you want, put the coords of an area where you don’t want people to logout at. I use mine for jail and for my duel arena.[/quote]
Oh ok.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 19, 2008, 09:35:47 AM[/size][hr]Wait it doesnt work! LOL

Read full topic

item.title: Can't logout if in Combat
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

[quote=“DuhPk, post:3, topic:182940”]Nope no errors…but

What are those coords for…what areas? Incase my server is part of it.[/quote]

Oh, you can edit those to what you want, put the coords of an area where you don’t want people to logout at. I use mine for jail and for my duel arena.

item.title: Can't logout if in Combat
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Give this ago

case 9154: //Log out { if ((absX >= 3121 && absX <= 3125 && absY >=3240 && absY <=3243 ) || (absX >= 2770 && absX <= 2810 && absY >=3310 && absY <=3330)) { sendMessage("Logout has been disabled for this area."); } else { if (LogoutDelay >= 1) { sendMessage("You must wait 20 seconds after combat to log out!"); } else if (LogoutDelay == 0) { logout(); savefile = true; } } } break;

What happens?

If you get errors, show me and i’ll give you the ints.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't logout if in Combat
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

This is my log out

case 9154: //Log out if (inCombat) { sendMessage("You must wait until you are out of combat before logging out!"); break; } // if(currentHealth > 0) logout(); savemoreinfo(); savechar(); break;

Doesn’t seem to work.
